title: 05/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin analyzes Russell Westbrook coming up short in the NBA play-in game and why this is par for the course based on what we’ve seen from Westbrook since Kevin Durant left for Golden State. He defends Celtics head coach Brad Stevens from those saying Boston has underachieved based on some questionable front office moves. He also reveals his NBA stars – NFL quarterback comparisons before the playoffs officially begin. Plus, professional trainer Tim Grover joins the show to talk about working with Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant and how that differs from his newest client Russell Wilson.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Colin analyzes Russell Westbrook coming up short in the NBA play-in game and why this is par for the course based on what we’ve seen from Westbrook since Kevin Durant left for Golden State. He defends Celtics head coach Brad Stevens from those saying Boston has underachieved based on some questionable front office moves. He also reveals his NBA stars – NFL quarterback comparisons before the playoffs officially begin. Plus, professional trainer Tim Grover joins the show to talk about working with Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant and how that differs from his newest client Russell Wilson.
